title: How to Load and Fire a 9mm Pistol

steps.title: Purchase a 9mm pistol.
steps.content: Purchase a 9mm pistol. A Glock brand pistol works well for most people. Glocks are affordable, reliable, and simple to operate.

steps.title: Purchase 9mm ammunition from any gun store and most sporting goods stores.
steps.content: Purchase 9mm ammunition from any gun store and most sporting goods stores. If you are not sure about which ammo you need, consult the shop keeper, most are happy to help.

steps.title: Press the button on the side of the hand grip to eject the magazine.
steps.content: Press the button on the side of the hand grip to eject the magazine.

steps.title: Insert ammunition one at a time into the top of the magazine, with the rounded side forward, until the magazine is full.
steps.content: Insert ammunition one at a time into the top of the magazine, with the rounded side forward, until the magazine is full.

steps.title: Re-insert magazine by moving it briskly and firmly upward into the hand grip until you hear a clicking noise which indicates the magazine has locked in place.
steps.content: Re-insert magazine by moving it briskly and firmly upward into the hand grip until you hear a clicking noise which indicates the magazine has locked in place. [1] X Research source

steps.title: If your pistol has a manual safety disengage it by manipulating the safety lever near the upper rear of the firearm.
steps.content: If your pistol has a manual safety disengage it by manipulating the safety lever near the upper rear of the firearm.

steps.title: Using the palm of your hand pull the slide to its rearmost position and release it to chamber a round.
steps.content: Using the palm of your hand pull the slide to its rearmost position and release it to chamber a round. If the slide has gone forward completely the weapon is ready to fire! [2] X Research source

steps.title: Align your eye with the sights and the target.
steps.content: Align your eye with the sights and the target. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Place your index finger onto the trigger only when you are ready to shoot.
steps.content: Place your index finger onto the trigger only when you are ready to shoot. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Pull the trigger one time for each shot you wish to fire.
steps.content: Pull the trigger one time for each shot you wish to fire.
